attributes.action: FORCE COUNCILS TO PROVIDE SUITABLE LARGE RECYCLING BINS TO EVERY HOME BEFORE CONSIDERING ANY REDUCTION IN OUR WASTE COLLECTIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many councils provide only small crates for recycling. These crates are untidy and don't hold very much. 

If councils were forced to supply and collect weekly a suitable large bin to collect the recyclable waste, more waste would be recycled.

Before there is any reduction in waste collections, or increase in charges recycling should be made easy. Better to use the carrot than the stick!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
